mapper.select:
select A.id, A.ming_cheng, A.rong_liang, A.yi_shou_ke_shi, B.ming_cheng as keChengMingCheng, D.xing_ming as banJiLaoShiXingMing, E.ming_cheng as banJiFenLeiMingCheng from ban_ji A left join ke_cheng B on A.ke_cheng_id = B.id left join lao_shi C on A.ban_ji_lao_shi_id = C.id left join zhang_hao D on C.zhang_hao_id = D.id left join ban_ji_fen_lei E on A.ban_ji_fen_lei_id = E.id
A.is_deleted = 0
order by A.update_time desc
select count(*) from ban_ji_ban_ji_xue_yuan_zu A where A.ban_ji_id = #{ban_ji_id} and A.is_deleted = 0
select count(*) from ban_ji_pai_ke_xin_xi A join pai_ke_ji_lu B on B.ban_ji_pai_ke_xin_xi_id = A.id where A.ban_ji_id = #{ban_ji_id} and A.is_deleted = 0 and B.is_deleted = 0

select count(*) from ban_ji_pai_ke_xin_xi A join pai_ke_ji_lu B on B.ban_ji_pai_ke_xin_xi_id = A.id where A.ban_ji_id = #{ban_ji_id} and A.is_deleted = 0 and B.is_deleted = 0 and B.pai_ke_ji_lu_zhuang_tai = 'YI_DIAN_MING'

select A.id, A.ming_cheng, A.rong_liang, A.shou_ke_ke_shi as moRenShouKeKeShi, A.bei_zhu, B.id as keChengId, B.ming_cheng as keChengMingCheng, B.qing_jia_kou_ke_shi, B.wei_dao_kou_ke_shi, C.id as shangKeJiaoShiId, C.ming_cheng as shangKeJiaoShi, D.id as banJiLaoShiId, E.xing_ming as banJiLaoShiXingMing, F.ming_cheng as banJiFenLeiMingCheng from ban_ji A left join ke_cheng B on A.ke_cheng_id = B.id left join shang_ke_jiao_shi C on A.shang_ke_jiao_shi_id = C.id left join lao_shi D on A.ban_ji_lao_shi_id = D.id left join zhang_hao E on D.zhang_hao_id = E.id left join ban_ji_fen_lei F on A.ban_ji_fen_lei_id = F.id
A.is_deleted = 0 and A.id = #{id}

select A.ban_ji_id, A.xue_yuan_id, A.created_at, A.is_deleted from ban_ji_ban_ji_xue_yuan_zu A
A.ban_ji_id = #{ban_ji_id} and A.is_deleted = 0

select A.id, A.ming_cheng, B.xing_ming as banJiLaoShiXingMing from ban_ji A left join zhang_hao B on A.ban_ji_lao_shi_id = B.id
A.is_deleted = 0 and A.ke_cheng_id = #{keChengId}

select A.id as banJiId, A.ke_cheng_id as keChengId, B.xue_yuan_id as xueYuanId, C.xing_ming as xueYuanXingMing, C.xing_bie, D.shou_ji from ban_ji A join ban_ji_ban_ji_xue_yuan_zu B on B.ban_ji_id = A.id and B.is_deleted = 0 join xue_yuan C on B.xue_yuan_id = C.id join zhang_hao D on C.zhang_hao_id = D.id
A.is_deleted = 0 and A.id = #{banJiId}

select A.id, A.sheng_yu_ke_shi, A.ke_cheng_zhuang_tai, A.ke_cheng_lei_xing, A.dan_jia, A.ke_cheng_shu_liang, A.zeng_song_ke_shi, A.you_hui_lei_xing, A.you_hui_shu_liang, A.bei_zhu, B.ming_cheng as keChengMingCheng from xue_yuan_ke_cheng A join ke_cheng B on A.ke_cheng_id = B.id
A.is_deleted = 0 and A.xue_yuan_id = #{xueYuanId} and A.ke_cheng_id = #{keChengId}

select distinct A.id, A.ming_cheng from ban_ji A join ban_ji_ban_ji_xue_yuan_zu B on B.ban_ji_id = A.id
B.xue_yuan_id = #{xueYuanId}
select A.id, A.ming_cheng from ban_ji A order by A.update_time desc
